metadata.title: CVE-2023-52680 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: scarlett2: Add missing error checks to *_ctl_get()The *_ctl_get() functions which call scarlett2_update_*() were notchecking the return value. Fix to check the return value and pass tothe caller.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
